DOC.criteria: To eligible inclusion study , subject must satisfy follow criterion : 1 . Participants must age 21 35 year 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 38 . 3 . Serum result cycle day 3 FSH < 10 mIU/ml . 4 . Be willing able comply protocol duration study . 5 . Have voluntarily provide write informed consent WIRB , prior studyrelated procedure part normal medical care , understanding subject may withdraw consent anytime without prejudice future medical care . 6 . Have pass psychological physical screening . A patient may NOT enter study present ANY follow criterion : 1 . Clinically significant systemic disease . 2 . Known endometriosis Grade III IV ( ASRM classification ) . 3 . Any previous cycle indicate low response gonadotropin stimulation ( defined retrieval < 10 egg retrieval ) 4 . Previous ovarian surgery 5 . Known allergy hypersensitivity recombinant gonadotropin preparation studyrelated medication . 6 . Known current substance abuse . 7 . Simultaneous participation another clinical trial . 8 . Current smoker . 9 . An extrauterine pregnancy within last 3 month OCP treatment commences . 10 . Previous participation similar study different center .
